numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph provides data about players of color and coaches of color in several sports.
2. In many sports, the percentage of players of color is high.
3. However, the percentage of coaches of color is low in these sports.
4. The National Football League has 74% players of color.
5. The National Football League has 13% coaches of color.
6. Major League Baseball is a sport in the graph.
7. Major League Baseball has the fewest players of color among the sports in the graph.
8. The percentage of players of color seems to have little correlation with the percentage of coaches of color.
9. We question why the percentage of players of color has little correlation with the percentage of coaches of color.
10. The information in the graph affects us.
11. The information in the graph affects our community.
12. Underrepresentation in sports can affect young people of color.
13. Some young people of color hope to pursue a career in professional sports.
14. Underrepresentation in sports can hurt the aspirations of these young people of color.
15. Our group believes that players should have people around them who are different.
16. Our group believes that coaches should have people around them who are different.
17. Some people have experienced different things.
18. If players have people around them who are different, then the players can grow.
19. If coaches have people around them who are different, then the coaches can grow.
20. If players have people around them who are different, then the players can create relationships.
21. If coaches have people around them who are different, then the coaches can create relationships.
22. The headline is: Major league sports in relation to coaches and players of color.
